Messages.AmountChanged: The %s amount has been changed to %s
Messages.GatherMessagesChanged: MoneyForGather gather messages in chat have been %s.
Messages.HelpText: Use /m4ghelp to get a list of MoneyForGather commands.
Messages.HelpText1: /setforwood <amount> - Sets the amount of money given for gathering wood
Messages.HelpText10: /m4gtoggleanimals - Toggles getting money for killing animlas
Messages.HelpText2: /setforores <amount> - Sets the amount of money given for gathering ores
Messages.HelpText3: /setforcorpses <amount> - Sets the amount of money given for gathering from corpses
Messages.HelpText4: /setforanimal <animal> <amount> - Sets the amount of money given for killing a particular animal
Messages.HelpText6: /m4gtogglechat - Toggles the MoneyForGather gather messages in chat on/off
Messages.HelpText7: /m4gtogglewood - Toggles getting money for gathering wood on/off
Messages.HelpText8: /m4gtoggleores - Toggles getting money for gathering ores on/off
Messages.HelpText9: /m4gtogglecorpses - Toggles getting money for gathering corpses on/off
Messages.InvalidAnimal: You have specified an invalid animal type. Valid types are bear, wolf, stag, boar, and chicken.
Messages.NoPermission: You do not have permission for that command.
Messages.OnAnimalKill: You have received %s for killing a %s.
